Package de.fzj.atlascore.configuration

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthorizationHeaderInterceptor
    This interceptor is used to extract the Authorization header from the incoming request If an Authorization header is set, it will be stored in the RequestContextService
    CachingConfig
    Cache for data from external apis
    ControllerPaths
    All paths as a constant value
    CustomWebConfiguration
    Enables CORS requests
    InterceptorAppConfig
    Configures all interceptors used in the application
    RestTemplateConfiguration
    This configuration creates a custom RestTemplate with interceptors to extend the outgoing requests.
    RestTemplateRequestInterceptor
    An interceptor for the custom RestTemplate bean.
    StaticPageController
    Controller for the static pages of the application
    SwaggerConfig
    Configuration for the swagger documentation
